meanings.definition: A cosmetic applied to the eyelashes to darken, thicken, and define them.
meanings.sent1: She bought a new mascara to make her eyelashes look darker and thicker.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, she carefully applies mascara to her eyelashes before going to work.
meanings.sent3: The mascara worked so well that her friends thought she was wearing fake eyelashes!
meanings.sent4: Her mascara was like a magic wand, transforming her eyelashes into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The mascara clung to her lashes like a loyal friend, enhancing her natural beauty.

meanings.definition: To apply mascara to one's eyelashes.
meanings.sent1: She likes to mascara her eyelashes before going out for dinner.
meanings.sent2: When she mascaraed her lashes, they instantly looked more defined.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally mascaraed his eyebrows instead of his eyelashes!
meanings.sent4: Her ability to mascara her lashes quickly amazed her friends.
meanings.sent5: As she mascaraed her lashes, she felt a sense of confidence wash over her.
